title: The best private members clubs for children in London - from Jedi training to Michelin cookery classes
text:
These days it’s not enough to buy them a mockingbird - children need a membership to the coolest clubs in town

The membership business is a behemoth, with nutritionists, fitness classes, sought after chefs and spaces designed by award-winning architects – and that’s just for the children.

Ever since Maggie and Rose opened its first branch in 2006 (the brand now has two London clubs and offshoots in Hong Kong and Singapore), private members’ clubs for children have been 'a thing' for parents looking to provide stimulating environments for their offspring in places they also want to spend time in themselves.

Here, just in time for the seemingly never-ending summer holidays, we’ve rounded up...
description: These days it’s not enough to buy them a mockingbird - children need a membership to the coolest clubs in town
